text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: TRÈS BIEEEN! I'm so glad you both<n>finally made it here!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
I've been using my drones to<n>observe your exquisite
display of<n>beauty from afar.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Oh my! Really?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Thank you... I think?

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Ahem! But things are not over just<n>yet. I still have to
witness your<n>proposal! Make your vows!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Let's start with you, Hishi Akebono!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Well... To me, a racer's outfit is a treat<n>you get as a reward.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
It's a special kind of buono you can<n>only receive after
giving it your all and<n>prevailing over a challenge.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Running a race with friends while<n>wearing your racewear
should be just<n>as fun as enjoying snack time with<n>
everyone.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
That's why I vow to get a special<n>racewear outfit along with
everyone<n>and run lots of buono races together!<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
You don't want an outfit just for<n>yourself, but for
everyone? For<n>someone who seems so carefree,<n>you
have unexpectedly big ambitions!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. My mom did always say"the bigger, the better." ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Indeed! I couldn't agree more! ♪<n>Okay, next up is Mayano
Top Gun!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I wanna grow up to be a strong,<n>mature woman!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Up until now, I always thought I<n>wanted to run an amazing
race in a<n>beautiful outfit in order to become a<n>twinkly lady...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: But after this audition... I know that's<n>not what I want.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
What I truly want is to become<n>someone who not only
makes myself<n>shine, but others as well!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So I'll need my racewear to help<n>make me twinkly so I can
make<n>others twinkly too!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I vow to become an Umamusume<n>worthy of my racewear!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Hehe. ♪ What a beautiful proposal! ☆

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Akebono and Mayano Top Gun,<n>naturally, the results
of your audition<n>are...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The curtains fall on the exciting<n>audition, and the day of the
Beauty<n>Dream Cup finally arrives...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The successful candidates of the<n>audition are garbed in their
new<n>racewear, awaiting the start of the<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Well, what do you think of the<n>dresses that I specifically
designed for<n>you?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: They're incredible! I feel like a<n>real-life princess!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Wow! It's so fluffy and<n>yummy-looking! It's such a buono<n>
dress. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I love it, but... is it really okay for me to<n>receive such a
wonderful garment?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
You're planning to become worthy of<n>it, right? If it ever
seems like it might<n>get taken from you, you gotta cling on<n>
to it with your dying breath!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Haha... Yes, you're right. I should<n>wear this with strong
conviction... or at<n>least, I should try.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Well said, Dober. I couldn't agree<n>more.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
(This dress is truly the work of a<n>first-rate designer. It's
similar to my<n>mother's racewear but unique in its<n>own
way. What remarkable<n>craftsmanship.)

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ms. Beauty, your dress design and<n>hairstyling for me are
out of this world!<n>♪ It feels like I've evolved into a real<n>
woman! ☆

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hehe! Thank you for the lovely<n>praise. ☆ Okay, ladies! It's
time to go!

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
A runway fit for my beautiful muses<n>and the très bien
racewear I designed<n>awaits...

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Come now! To the stage of the<n>Beauty Dream Cup!

text_block_list.name: Event Caster
text_block_list.text:
Our racers, clad in new racewear<n>designed by the great
Beauty<n>Anshinzawa, are off to a flying start!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Each dress truly is remarkable in its<n>own way! As for our
racers, they're<n>all exceptional Umamusume who<n>managed
to pass a rigorous audition<n>process.

text_block_list.name: Event Caster
text_block_list.text: Oh! Mayano Top Gun suddenly<n>surges into the lead!

text_block_list.name: Event Caster
text_block_list.text:
But Air Groove is hot on her heels!<n>And trailing just behind
them—

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro Dober, Kawakami Princess,<n>and Hishi Akebono are
in hot pursuit!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's attention is on me! ☆<n>They're all totally
charmed by my<n>dazzling racing figure. ♪

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Even though this is just an exhibition<n>race, my goal is still
the same—to<n>show the audience my best and<n>cross the
finish line first!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Air Groove's mother has come to<n>watch, so it's no
wonder she's fired<n>up... Even so, I don't intend to lose!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to rip through the finish line,<n>and no one can stop
me! Keep your<n>eyes on me, my future Prince<n>Charming!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text: Racing is so much fun! It's so buono,<n>buono! ♪

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
(Hehe. Every single one of them is<n>blindingly dazzling! Ah,
this is exactly<n>why I can never get enough of this<n>job!)

text_block_list.name: Beauty Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: You're all stunning beauties, my<n>dears!
